**Summary**
• Qualcomm and BMW are partnering to develop a new hands-free driving system.
• The system will allow drivers to take their hands off the wheel on approved roads, enhancing convenience and driving experience.
• Qualcomm aims to expand its presence in the automotive industry through this collaboration.
• The partnership reflects the increasing trend of car companies adopting advanced driver-assistance systems (ADAS).

**Why it matters**
• Users may benefit from enhanced driving convenience and safety features in future BMW vehicles.
• Investors may see Qualcomm's increased involvement in the automotive sector as a positive sign for growth and market diversification.

**Risks**
• The success of the hands-free driving system depends on regulatory approvals and public acceptance of autonomous driving technology.

**Opportunities**
• Qualcomm can leverage this partnership to further innovate and expand its portfolio of automotive solutions.

**Market view**
Market — Positive for Qualcomm and BMW, indicating growth in the ADAS sector.

**Sources**
